member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_UDPTABLE structure contains the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table for IPv4 on the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures.
